page.title: 07A DAY IN ROWSLEY
page.content: A DAY IN ROWSLEY WHEN I WAKE UP I GET DRESSED, BRUSH MY HAIR, AND GO TO SCHOOL . TODAY IS A WEDNESDAY AND IT IS SWIMMING DAY. FIRST WE GO TO ASSEMBLY, THEN WE GO BACK TO CLASS AND WORK. AT 10.40 AM IT IS PLAYTIME.NOW PLAY IS OVER AND WE GO BACK TO LESSONS.AT 11.50AM WE GO AND LAY TABLES FOR DINNER WHEN WE FINISH DINNER WE GO AND PLAY TILL THE SWIMMERS HAVE TO GO AT 1.55PM WE HAVE TO MEET MRS WEATHERILL IN THE VILLAGE HALL.NOW WE ARE AT SWIMMING AND WE ARE IN THE POOL.WE HAVE LESSONS THEN WE GET OUT WHEN WE HAVE FINISED.WE ARE BACK AT SCHOOL AND PLAYTIME IS OVER.HOME TIME AND KATE IS COMING UP TO RIDE NOW WE ARE RIDING KATES HORSE IS CALLED PEGGY AND MINE IS CALLED FOZZY KATE HAS GONE HOME.I AM HAVING MY TEA I HAVE FINISHED MY TEA AT 9.00PM IS MY BED TIME AND I GO TO BED
